sentence: (Hyosub Shin/Atlanta Journal-Constitution via AP, File) WASHINGTON (AP) Herschel Walker, the football legend and leading Republican Senate candidate in Georgia, often boasts of his work helping service members and veterans struggling with mental health.
author: BRIAN SLODYSKO
title: Herschel Walker's ties to veterans program face scrutiny

sentence: There are still kids who will wear Herschel Walkers football jerseys some 40 years after he played for the University of Georgia.
title: Herschel Walker's ties to veterans program face scrutiny
